362032521.reviewBody: we enjoyed the Art Walk and then dinner at Mark\'s. The Art Walk is just down the street and it was delightful. We bought some beautiful tiles (just made weight on the flight back home) and wished that we could have bought more. Love Bucerias!

361626604.name: Enjoyable way to end a Thursday evening.
361626604.author: a TripAdvisor user
361626604.reviewBody: Thursday evenings local galleries are open offering refreshments ,a chance to meet with the artists, watch some demos  and of course purchase some art. Many of the galleries are also open during the day but there is something very enjoyable about wandering the streets in the evening after a nice dinner at one of over 200 restaurants in this town.  There is a self guided art walk map available. Bucerias is full of great restaurants, artists, galleries , music and is a  must visit if in the area. Next visit to the area Bucerias will be our home base. This time around we started in Bucerias for three days at the beginning of our stay and yet went  back twice.

357934428.name: Fun Thurs night!
357934428.author: a TripAdvisor user
357934428.reviewBody: Several galleries open their doors Thursday nights from 7 - 9.  We had a fun time gallery hopping and viewing wonderful pieces.  Bought a couple of things from artists, and wishing we had more money and room for more!  We\'ll be back next trip!

357470346.name: Great Thursday nights entertainment
357470346.author: a TripAdvisor user
357470346.reviewBody: A great way to spend a Thursday evening with tourists, locals and of course the artists themselves with live music, dancers with a festive feel.

356191742.name: A fun way to spend the evening
356191742.author: a TripAdvisor user
356191742.reviewBody: All the shops are open and some have wine and cookies. Not great bargains but great to wander and see the art and the shops.

355576836.name: A fFine Evening
355576836.author: a TripAdvisor user
355576836.reviewBody: If you are near Bucerias, check out the Thursday night Art Walk  It is a fine opportunity to see some beautiful art in a pleasant environment,  Get a glass of wine or a cocktail and visit all of the studios, which are within a few blocks f each other.  Cap off your evening with dinner at Sandrinas, Rosa Mexicana, or Karen\'s Place. There is something new each week, and I never tire of this excursion!

354918938.name: Fun, but expected more vendors.
354918938.author: a TripAdvisor user
354918938.reviewBody: The art that was on display was great.  Thought the area would be filled with artisans, but, there were not many.  Quality was very good.

353107941.name: Bucerias has some wonderful artists.
353107941.author: a TripAdvisor user
353107941.reviewBody: This is a must do on your trip to Bucerias.\nThursday nights 7-9pm. \nThere is art for every taste and budget.

351647568.name: Much ado about nothing
351647568.author: a TripAdvisor user
351647568.reviewBody: Really just a rehash of items available for viewing anytime. A pleasant stroll n the evening but not much more

351311741.name: Very interesting and original pieces!
351311741.author: a TripAdvisor user
351311741.reviewBody: It was such a nice thing to share in the talent and creativity of the local artists.  I never felt pressured to purchase, all of the artists and sellers were happy to share their crafts, and no one minded us taking pictures.

350916622.name: Great \'walk\'!
350916622.author: a TripAdvisor user
350916622.reviewBody: We enjoyed our art walk, lots of great art to see.  Would recommend for anyone and certainly if you are looking to purchase a unique item.

349790411.name: Great way to spend evening!
349790411.author: a TripAdvisor user
349790411.reviewBody: My wife and i truly enjoyed our "art walk".  So much to see and encounter.  Great place to visit if you love art.

349088972.name: Lovely night visit
349088972.author: a TripAdvisor user
349088972.reviewBody: On a Thursday night the artists open up their studios and you can chat to them and see their work. A great interesting evening out, you may even pick up something unusual and unique.

348617584.name: Nice Peices of Art
348617584.author: a TripAdvisor user
348617584.reviewBody: We did the art walk just to check it out, we didn\'t stop at every place. The ones we did had some really nice things. Nice craft items as well as other art pieces. We didn\'t spend as much time looking as we should have, maybe next time.

346894761.name: No pressure to buy --- great evening!
346894761.author: a TripAdvisor user
346894761.reviewBody: We enjoyed meandering thru the galleries and saw a lot of very talented artisans\' works. Really fun night.

345934345.name: Great casual evening out
345934345.author: a TripAdvisor user
345934345.reviewBody: You can do this over and over because there is always something a little bit different each week.  You\'ll see art and crafts of various kinds and the people watching is also excellent.  There\'s also the opportunity to drop into several eateries for liquid sustenance!

345580655.name: Wonderful Art walk
345580655.author: a TripAdvisor user
345580655.reviewBody: The talented artists and their art I will never forget! Spectacular\nThe realistic pictures .The colors so vibrant. The images unbelievable\n

345089810.name: nice local town
345089810.author: a TripAdvisor user
345089810.reviewBody: if you want to see more of a local feel and still have the restaurants and the shopping. Check out the art walk and downtown section of bucerias. old mexico feel

344394644.name: MEET THE ARTISTS
344394644.author: a TripAdvisor user
344394644.reviewBody: A wide variety of art to enjoy and much of it is presented by the creating artist.  We went from shop to shop and spent an entire evening.  It was like going to a good folk art museum.  We highly recommend that you take this in, if visiting Bucerias.

344316159.name: This town is not short of talented artist.
344316159.author: a TripAdvisor user
344316159.reviewBody: Many of the local galleries in Bucerias are open daily but Thursday evenings all of the galleries are open.  Many serve wine and snacks but the real treat is the talented people in this small lovely town.  There are several galleries that offer classes if you are interested in developing your hidden talents.  Last winter I took several lessons and really enjoyed myself.\n\nStroll the streets if this charming city and stop for dinner.

344059085.name: A Pleasant Evening Walk
344059085.author: a TripAdvisor user
344059085.reviewBody: This walk takes place on Thursday evenings and can be enjoyed at your own pace during the defined hours. There are many galleries with a variety of art styles and prices for everyone. Many will ship larger pieces if desired.

343650529.name: A nice way to spend time on the way to dinner
343650529.author: a TripAdvisor user
343650529.reviewBody: We always enjoy the Thursday evening art walk. We get a chance to meet local artists and view their art-some of which is quite nice and interesting. Many of the galleries offer complimentary wine and chips, etc. a nice touch.

341027573.name: Stop and take a look.
341027573.author: a TripAdvisor user
341027573.reviewBody: I noticed lots of people just brushing past this spot, not sure why, it\'s really cute to look into the studios where the artists are at work and have their work on display. I chatted with one artist who I thought had the most beautiful paintings.  Don\'t walk by, stop and take a look.

340575026.name: Art Walk
340575026.author: a TripAdvisor user
340575026.reviewBody: Very interesting art and fun environment to explore the local artists. They provide some food and some wine or tequila

336637848.name: Relaxing
336637848.author: a TripAdvisor user
336637848.reviewBody: it was a great way to see the city and some nice artwork and great people.\nno pressure to buy and worth doing

334897656.name: This was a great way to see the artists from the local Farmer\'s Markets, without the food and music.
334897656.author: a TripAdvisor user
334897656.reviewBody: We had visited multiple local Farmers Markets and enjoy all.  But when it was time to return to that one merchant, for a custom item not available 24 hours before, we ended up here.  I have walked that street dozens of times and not noticed the art walk . So pleasant.  And easy to pick up those items from vendors we were seeking out.

333364312.name: interesting
333364312.author: a TripAdvisor user
333364312.reviewBody: we walked the Bucerias art walk & it was very interesting. A lot of different types of art work. A lot of local artists. Owners appeared to be informantive about the different art workd on display. worth going to view.

328058904.name: Great eve out
328058904.author: a TripAdvisor user
328058904.reviewBody:
Fun eve  out    A walk along the cobblestones in bucerias 
Lots of local artists   Painting sculptors. Small bars got drinks.  And great dinning 
Friendly  atmosphere    
Lots of local  Mexican art work

320188384.name: Interesting
320188384.author: a TripAdvisor user
320188384.reviewBody: A nice way to spend part of day.  Interesting works of art with all being authentic and most are 1 of a kind.

320142312.name: GREAT TRIP!!! ALTHOUGH FELT AS THOUGH I WAS BEING STALKED
320142312.author: a TripAdvisor user
320142312.reviewBody: I don\'t like to put a negative comment, but almost continually throughout the whole time I spent there these timeshare weasels literally chased me down the street at least a block or two. Acting desperately as though their life depended on my going to a 90 minute presentation *(which from previous experience was intense high pressure). Personally vacation is time to relax and relieve stress. Quite the contrary I was hounded almost continually. I love Mexico but this harassment left me anxious and nervous. I hope the city is aware of this and could do something about it. Please don\'t let this discourage you, my date beautiful girl could of caused all of the attention that I alone do not receive. ciao for now H. Harken

301898421.name: A nice visit just off Av Lazaro Cardenas
301898421.author: a TripAdvisor user
301898421.reviewBody: lots of local made art - very beautiful. Well worth a visit even if just to look. Prices vary from cheapy-cheapy to expensive...

301175825.name: Great fun!!
301175825.author: a TripAdvisor user
301175825.reviewBody: We were there around Christmas so it was a lot going on.  Great local art and just fun to walk areound.

298842267.name: Walking The Street Of Art
298842267.author: a TripAdvisor user
298842267.reviewBody: This is during the week If I remember on a Tuesday in the early evening . There is so much to look at but it is worth it . there is street art which they do their work of art right on the street itself so you have too watch your step because you may be looking up at something else on the building which takes your mind off where you are walking . Some places you walk into a building to look at the art inside there is a lot of different art of from different  artists  that paint or work with metal or wood all very well done, you can buy the art and ship it back to your home or take it on the plane when you leave. So have a good time when you go.

295403976.name: Great Art by locals
295403976.author: a TripAdvisor user
295403976.reviewBody: Locals have great works n display and some of the best I\'ve seen anywhere including USA and Europe. Some of the artists just needs someone to discover them and show their work in other countries or take them under their wings to improve their skills.

286935851.name: Great Fun!
286935851.author: a TripAdvisor user
286935851.reviewBody: I love the Thursday Art Walk in Bucerias.  The galleries are numerous, with great variety and a chance to meet and visit with the artists.  We love to go with a group, then meet up in Bucerias at one of the great restaurants there.

277682089.name: The Casual Art Walk
277682089.author: a TripAdvisor user
277682089.reviewBody: Strolling down the well paved street in Bucerias you will feel safe and relaxed.  They have done a great job making this a fantastic evening stroll.  Not as good of job of promoting each of the stores.  But as far as adventure you will find GREAT out of the norm art.  Sometimes you have to go up stairs, wander in back rooms or stroll into fantastic court yards to find the masterpieces.

275163244.name: Can\'t ever get enough!
275163244.author: a TripAdvisor user
275163244.reviewBody: Always treasures to find and great moments to have! People are amazing, friendly just a lovely outing!

266150630.name: Season is over.
266150630.author: a TripAdvisor user
266150630.reviewBody: Very disappointed.  Had read about the Art Walk & was greatly looking forward to it.  Had asked numerous locals where it was & no one could tell us.  Finally asked Miguel Angel, a local business owner, who is very knowledgeable & friendly.  He also has a restaurant & sports bar on the main avenue by the beach!  Anyway, we stumbled around & finally found the area only to be told that the season had ended the week of Easter.  There are supposedly some art galleries to view, but, we never really found them.  Very disappointed.  The season is supposedly January thru first of April, as far as the outside vendors and the actual "art walk".

265440583.name: an entertaining evening!
265440583.author: a TripAdvisor user
265440583.reviewBody: There are a number of galleries within a short walking distance.  You run into people you have met around town.  I\'t a fun social event!

263263767.name: A touch of elegance in quiet, little Bucerias
263263767.author: a TripAdvisor user
263263767.reviewBody: If you are in the area on a Thursday night, you should not miss the Artwalk.  The kinds of artwork that you will see will have you wondering if you could carry it on the plane when you have to go home.  There is sculpture, canvas art of all types and ceramics.  There was a pencil drawing of a fish that my wife and I coveted but it was too big to carry on the plane and I didn\'t want to have to ship it home....but I still think about it! All along the Artwalk route are great restaurants to enjoy and wish that you were back in Bucerias next Thursday night.

257562393.name: Nice Walk
257562393.author: a TripAdvisor user
257562393.reviewBody: This was a pleasant way to spend a Thursday evening.  It is a nice leisurely walk with plenty of art pieces for every taste.

253444296.name: Great way to spend an evening in Bucerias.
253444296.author: a TripAdvisor user
253444296.reviewBody:
this happens every Thursday night. 7:00 to 9:00pm
Some of the vendors have wine and snacks. Great opportunity to talk with the original artists about their wares. 

Dr.Rico
Canada

251689933.name: shockingly good art
251689933.author: a TripAdvisor user
251689933.reviewBody: you wouldn\'t think small town of Bucerias could have great art, but it does.  Art walk is great, even more art in galleries lining main street in town.  Great eating areas and beach area too. This is a US expat area with lots of americans there who own condos. Very safe

250648515.name: Well worth your time
250648515.author: a TripAdvisor user
250648515.reviewBody: An interesting and entertaining way to spend your Thursday evening on Lazaro Cardenas - beautiful artwork and pieces in all price ranges - and bring some cash - you will definitely find something that you will like -

248644335.name: All was great.
248644335.author: a TripAdvisor user
248644335.reviewBody:
we go every Thur. night. Always something different to see.
The people are friendly.
Enjoy
Dr.Rico
Canada

247097165.name: Lovely evening
247097165.author: a TripAdvisor user
247097165.reviewBody: A chance to peruse the local artisans wares in the cool of the evening. Wish it included a couple easy listening musicians - one at each end of the walk.

246735022.name: Great way to see new artisans
246735022.author: a TripAdvisor user
246735022.reviewBody: Walking the Lazaro Cardenas on Thursday nights one can wander into unique shops and art work on display at various stores. Try the roasted pecans or almonds in sugar. Also along the 4 block walk  are restaurants and outdoor cafes. After your walk stop by the red apple up 2 floors for a flaming Spanish coffee and deep fried ice cream.

242501578.name: FUN FUN FUN
242501578.author: a TripAdvisor user
242501578.reviewBody: The Bucerias Artwalk was a fun way to meet the locals and see some great local art. There are several small restaurants in the area which are great and some, if not all, if the small galleries or artists workshops offer drinks or appetizers too. We had a blast.

241659581.name: Bucerias Art Walk
241659581.author: a TripAdvisor user
241659581.reviewBody: The art walk is part of the best of Bucerias . It has so many different looks from traditional art to native art of Mexico and so much more. Worth the time. My friend George manages and owns Casabor and his gallery has so much to offer. I met him when my wife and I rented the Casa d la Reyna villas behind his store. Both are outstanding places.

240564092.name: Fantastic event!
240564092.author: a TripAdvisor user
240564092.reviewBody: Nice people, great location for this type of event. So many nice art galleries in Bucerias. So many on the same street within walking distance!

240244349.name: Artwalk is a pleasant evening
240244349.author: a TripAdvisor user
240244349.reviewBody: the weather was perfect and the Artwalk stores are very friendly - we enjoyed some crackers and cheese and a few wines

238757570.name: Great time! Great people!
238757570.author: a TripAdvisor user
238757570.reviewBody: The wine walk makes for a nice night strolling thru bucerias. We met nice, interesting people. Drank some wine and looked at some fantastic art work!

233940043.name: A must do if you are in Bucerias
233940043.author: a TripAdvisor user
233940043.reviewBody: So many great artists on display in several cute liltle shops.  Some have appys and drinks for you to have while browsing.  We found a gorgeous picture at Casabor and brought it back to Canada with us.  They unframed it and packaged it up for us to bring home on the plane.  We will go back and hopefully get another one in the future.

232752789.name: Interesting way to spend an evening.
232752789.author: a TripAdvisor user
232752789.reviewBody: My husband and I have done the Bucerias art walk several times and always seen something new and interesting. Great being able to stroll around, have a cocktail and enjoy some good art. There were several Canadian artists represented but also many Mexicans with major talent. Something for everyone.

227187444.name: A little community spirit in Bucerias
227187444.author: a TripAdvisor user
227187444.reviewBody: It\'s a nice way to go for a walk, lessening to music, check some artistic works and have a chat (in English) with friends.\nPlenty of little restaurant in the area to grab a drink or something to eat and enjoy the excitement of the walk! People there are very friendly and are welcoming all comers.

221603422.name: Beautiful night
221603422.author: a TripAdvisor user
221603422.reviewBody: This is a must see while in Bucerias.  The walk and strolling cocktails are fantastic. The people are friendly and the evening is unforgettable. I would advise making this a part of your agenda.

220590049.name: Canadian Art show
220590049.author: a TripAdvisor user
220590049.reviewBody: Interesting offerings, but most of the exhibitors were Canadian not Mexican. It seems most of the southern part of Bucerias is more Canadian than Mexican and for us this is not a positive.

210993417.name: Artwork
210993417.author: a TripAdvisor user
210993417.reviewBody: very interesting seeing all the business that open up for this each week. Beautiful work.  It makes for a nice night stroll down the main street after enjoying a nice supper.\n

204220307.name: A nice evening stroll through some very cool art
204220307.author: a TripAdvisor user
204220307.reviewBody: We really enjoyed wandering through the different art shops and galleries on the Thursday night art walk. Most shops are closed in the evening and this was so nice and relaxed. No one pressuring us to buy anything. Many places had refreshments available for us to try if we wanted also. I hope to come back with more suitcases to take back some of the lovely art we saw.

202431395.name: Artistic side of Bucerias revealed
202431395.author: a TripAdvisor user
202431395.reviewBody: No better way to view the skills of local artisans! Walk & view the artistic treasures of Bucerias at your own pace...with a drink & nibblies on the side. A very enjoyable way to spend a Thursday evening.

200087513.name: You can see the galleries during the day as well
200087513.author: a TripAdvisor user
200087513.reviewBody: Great little area to explore. Quirky art/ lots of galleries, nice restaurants. You can spend an afternoon strolling and enjoying the ambiance.Go for a walk and  check it out. Quieter area and not as many peddlers to approach you. If staying at the Decameron it is an easy walk.

198643552.name: Tequila Art Walk!
198643552.author: a TripAdvisor user
198643552.reviewBody: Fun way to meet people in town, and most of the galleries/shops have cocktails (lots of tequila!) and snacks!

197946504.name: Wandering the streets
197946504.author: a TripAdvisor user
197946504.reviewBody: Take in as much or as little as you like.  Thank you to the talented artists, who made the after dinner (at Le Bistro) walkabout very pleasant.

197407245.name: A nice attraction
197407245.author: a TripAdvisor user
197407245.reviewBody: We enjoy visiting the art walk after dinner on a Thursday evening.  It is a nice end to the evening.  Keep up the good work.

196860240.name: Little change from last year
196860240.author: a TripAdvisor user
196860240.reviewBody: While we enjoy the walk each year we found this year very little change form past years. Almost tot he point of being repetitive.

196284680.name: Fun way to spend a Thursday evening
196284680.author: a TripAdvisor user
196284680.reviewBody: On Thursday evenings, from 7-9 pm, the artist\'s studios and art galleries are open in Bucerius. Many of them offer free drinks and snacks as we strolled and looked at some beautiful art.  Most interesting was the studio where we could watch the artist making mosaics from small pieces of cut glass.  If you are staying nearby, it is a fun thing to do.

195226471.name: Lovely way to spend the evening
195226471.author: a TripAdvisor user
195226471.reviewBody: All the talented people. Hard to pick an item to treasure and get home safely. This is a lovely leisurely stroll down the street and into the court yards. A few local artists but a lot are expats .

194905639.name: " Great way to spend a Thursdau evening "
194905639.author: a TripAdvisor user
194905639.reviewBody: The Bucerias Art  Walk is a wonderful way to see some of  the local art / artists . It runs from  7-9 pm and is on Lazaro Cardenas .Many of the shops have appies  and drinks to enjoy as well and we find that it has a wonderful atmosphere. We always make sure that it is on our list to do at least of few times while we are in the area. Highly recommend!

194516902.name: Enjoyable stroll thru Bucerias on a Thursday evening.
194516902.author: a TripAdvisor user
194516902.reviewBody: Excellent way to see all the works of art and spend the evening outdoors drifting through galleries and stores.

193500364.name: Bucerias art walk
193500364.author: a TripAdvisor user
193500364.reviewBody: A very fun experience. We look forward to doing this again! Local artists and good prices on some very interesting pieces. If you are in Bucerias on a Thursday, you should attend.

192376094.name: Art, walk, food, drink
192376094.author: a TripAdvisor user
192376094.reviewBody: Great way to experience hospitality of the artists and shops on Thursday eves. Most offer samples of food, tequila, local fresh beverages and welcome all into their passion for art.

191870115.name: A Stroll Through Local Culture
191870115.author: a TripAdvisor user
191870115.reviewBody: People in galleries are welcoming and love to share their talented artists.  Evening ambiance is warm and charming.

191544962.name: Always a Fun "Free" Activity
191544962.author: a TripAdvisor user
191544962.reviewBody: Strolling through Bucerias\' art shops for their night Art Walk is something we enjoy doing at least once per trip. It\'s free if you don\'t buy anything. If you\'re in town and don\'t have plans on an Art Walk night, it\'s an enjoyable activity to do with your spouse, with friends, with family, or by yourself too I suppose. If you\'ve got money to spend art, it\'ll be that much more enjoyable as you remember your time in Bucerias once you\'ve returned to your "normal" life :)

191377986.name: Nice event
191377986.author: a TripAdvisor user
191377986.reviewBody: Many of the galleries and stores offered snacks and wine.  It was fun to meet some of the artists too.  It is definitely a quality mix as far as the art and crafts are concerned but still a nice evening.

191260435.name: Relaxed stroll to see broad range of art
191260435.author: a TripAdvisor user
191260435.reviewBody: On a summy day in January, we strolled the markets of Bucerias and then crossed the bridge to the art walk. Glad we did. Paintings, sculpture, jewellry, woven mats. Relaxed pace, no hassle, browse as much as you want.

190511872.name: A nice way to spend an evening
190511872.author: a TripAdvisor user
190511872.reviewBody: Some great artwork from local and visiting artists.  Something for everyone and a friendly art community!

189060712.name: Small, but engaging at times
189060712.author: a TripAdvisor user
189060712.reviewBody: Its billed as an "art walk" but I think all told less than a dozen shops and galleries are there. A few of them are really wonderful. Some others are just overpriced craft shops. \n\nStill, it is fun to drift with the crowd and many shops offered drinks, snacks, and sometimes good conversation with the owner or artists.

188414525.name: Great experience to see
188414525.author: a TripAdvisor user
188414525.reviewBody: For art lovers and unique art collectors this walk is a must to see. You have approx. 20 galleries to view so wear comfy shoes.

186470853.name: I guess we were expecting more.
186470853.author: a TripAdvisor user
186470853.reviewBody: It was a nice walk and there were a couple of nice galleries and things to see, but we honestly expected more.  There was a lot of hype about it and it was very quiet with a lot less things to look at than we thought.  We had a nice walk though.

153227324.name: lots of stuff
153227324.author: a TripAdvisor user
153227324.reviewBody: We had a day trip to Bucerias! It was a great day looking at all the arts, people, and foods of this fun little place. We ate on the beach and had a great time shopping and watching all the different things there!! we would love to go there again!!

149348177.name: It\'s growing and getting better
149348177.author: a TripAdvisor user
149348177.reviewBody: Two years ago I did aThursday evening Art Walk - it was okay, but not great.  But last month I was there again and was really impressed with how much it has grown!  Lots more galleries open, offering punch and various snacks.  Artists there to talk with us about their work - and some of it was quite amazing.  Definitely recommend spending some time downtown on Art Walk Thursdays!

136432673.name: Art Walk a Must Do
136432673.author: a TripAdvisor user
136432673.reviewBody: We have done the Art Walk several times and it is always a treat. Love the walk along the cobble streets and exploring all of the shops. Stop and enjoy dinner somewhere to complete the evening. The street is very romantic with all of the gallery and street lights.

129800406.name: Wonderful
129800406.author: a TripAdvisor user
129800406.reviewBody: We\'ve been on the Art Walk for the past 4 years.  It\'s always a nice way to spend an evening.  Artists bring out their work and display in on the street.  Sometimes there are lots of art, others days it\'s a bit quieter.  Either way, it\'s an interesting way to spend an evening in Mexico!

128062744.name: Artistic Bucerias at its best
128062744.author: a TripAdvisor user
128062744.reviewBody:
So cool here... stroll along the artistic area... "gardenias lazaros" (will have to check my spelling!).  The cobble stone streets are lined with authentic old pueblos.. housing great art galleries, wonderful unique gift shops and cheap chic restaurants.  Lots of places to take classes - glass blowing, mosaics, mexican cookery/cuisine.  Wonderful restaurants, and coffee shops (check out all the other tips)
This area is east over the foot bridge from the flea market.  Or West from Royal DeCameron resort before getting to the foot bridge.  Many tourists don't find it because they are too busy looking at the main Bucerias street and flea market.!
I actually did a great mosaic class at "Broken Art".... It was also the first day of spring and there was street parade - all the children dressed up and vehicles decorated with flowers.
The main area of Bucerias is lovely too, with a lovely square lined with food vendors and as well as jewellry and crafts.  The area has really grown in the past 5 years and there are more hotels and restaurants lining the gorgeous beach.
Bucerias is easy to get to by bus.

124719828.name: What an enjoyable evening walking off a great dinner!
124719828.author: a TripAdvisor user
124719828.reviewBody: Never knew there is an annual art walk. What an great time. Friendly shop owners, artists and fellow art enthusiasts, make for a nice night. The wine doesn\'t hurt either! Such a peaceful street on this side of the bridge.
